item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for this post. We also started to use mirroring..the biggest challenge is to do the initial thing on brand new servers if you have a 800 GB Database and the data centers are in different locations in the US

Mirroring is so much better than replication in terms of licensing (Only 1 license needed) and in terms of setup…No more GUIDs that use up space in tables and run out of identity space
